pub_data <- fromJSON(here::here("_data", "publications.json"))

## Overview

This website provides an automatically updated list of outputs from the College of MVLS Learning Teaching and Scholarship network at the University of Glasgow. Publication data is sourced directly from [ORCID](https://orcid.org) profiles and updated weekly via GitHub Actions.

::: callout-note
## Current Statistics

-   **`r pub_data$n_authors`** linked authors
-   **`r pub_data$n_sotl`** SoTL/education outputs
-   **Last updated:** `r pub_data$last_updated`
:::

## Recent SoTL Publications

Publications are automatically classified based on journal name and keywords to identify those related to the **Scholarship of Teaching and Learning (SoTL)** and those that are likely to be discipline-specific, so errors may occur. 

```{r}
#| label: recent-pubs
#| echo: false
#| results: asis

pubs <- pub_data$publications |>
 as_tibble() |>
 filter(type == "journal-article",
        !is.na(sotl_matched_on)) |>
 head(10)

for (i in seq_len(nrow(pubs))) {
  pub <- pubs[i, ]
  
  # Build citation string with school in brackets
  author_text <- if (!is.na(pub$network_authors_school) && pub$network_authors_school != "") {
    glue("{pub$network_authors_school}. ")
  } else {
    ""
  }
  
  title_text <- if (!is.na(pub$url) && pub$url != "") {
    glue("[{pub$title}]({pub$url})")
  } else {
    pub$title
  }
  
  year_text <- if (!is.na(pub$year)) glue(" ({pub$year})") else ""
  journal_text <- if (!is.na(pub$journal) && pub$journal != "") glue(" *{pub$journal}*.") else ""
  
  cat(glue("- {author_text}{title_text}{year_text}.{journal_text}\n\n"))
}
```
